item.title: Setup Ansible on your Mac to connect to remote Windows Domain Servers/Workstations using secure Kerberos
item.description: This article shows you how to setup Ansible on your Mac to connect to remote Windows Domain Servers/Workstations using secure Kerberos. Ansible supports authentication to Windows using NTLM over http (bad), NTLM over https (better) our Kerberos over HTTPS (best). Surprisingly it's the easiest to setup also, so no excuses.
